name: Liminal Template I
desc: The template establishes a tenuous connection to the Liminality, its Linkage shimmering against the metal as the Instructions change reality.

name: Liminal Template II
desc: The template creates a resonant connection to the Liminality. The Linkage glows as the effects of its Instructions flow freely.

name: Liminal Template III
desc: The template creates a harmonious bond with the Liminality, Linkage pulsing with the power of complex Instructions.

name: Liminal Template IV
desc: The template achieves perfect synchronization with the Liminality, the boundary between possible and impossible are fluid to you.
